lightning.title: Lightning Settings
lightning.subtitle: Configure your Lightning Network payment settings
lightning.lnbitsUrlHint: Enter the URL of your LNbits instance

lightning.albyHubInfoDescription: Connect to your self-hosted Alby Hub instance for full control over your Lightning node with auto-payment detection.
lightning.accessTokenHint: Generate an access token from your Alby Hub dashboard
lightning.blinkDescription: Blink wallet with Bitcoin Beach standards
lightning.blinkInfoDescription: Connect to Blink wallet for easy Lightning payments with auto-detection. Get your API key from dev.blink.sv
lightning.blinkApiKeyHint: Get your API key from dev.blink.sv dashboard
lightning.albyInfoDescription: Alby uses WebLN to connect directly from your browser. Note: No auto-detection - manual confirmation required.
lightning.albyInstallHint: Please install the Alby browser extension
lightning.nwcHint: Paste your Nostr Wallet Connect string starting with nostr+walletconnect://
lightning.nwcTipDescription: You can get this from Alby, Mutiny, or other NWC-compatible wallets
lightning.lnurlHint: Enter your Lightning address from any supported wallet
lightning.lnurlInfoDescription: Lightning addresses work like email addresses. Payments are received directly to your wallet without running a node.
lightning.lightningAddressHint: Your Lightning address for receiving payments (e.g., name{'@'}getalby.com)
lightning.bolt12OfferHint: Static BOLT12 offer for reusable payment requests
lightning.securityLockedDescription: Your data encryption is enabled but locked. Please unlock to view or modify API keys.
lightning.keysNotEncryptedDescription: Your API keys are stored without encryption. Enable data encryption with a master password for better security.

users.title: User Management
users.subtitle: Manage users and roles for your store
users.noPermissionDescription: You don't have permission to manage users. Contact your store owner.
users.name: Name
users.pinHint: Used for quick login at POS terminal

roleDesc.owner: Full access to all features including user management, settings, and financial data
roleDesc.admin: Can manage products, orders, customers, and view reports. Cannot manage users or lightning settings.
roleDesc.cashier: Can create orders, apply discounts, and view products. Limited access to reports.
roleDesc.staff: Basic POS access only. Can create orders and view products.

backup.dataWillBeReplacedDesc: All your current data will be replaced with the backup data. This cannot be undone.
backup.restoreSuccessDesc: Your data has been restored. The page will reload.
